code: @Test public void sendToTwoEmbeddedBrokers() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("activemq1:queue:foo", "foo").     template.sendBody("activemq2:queue:bar", "bar").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
